scripts.deploy:pro:force: cp wrangler.toml wrangler.toml.bak && cat production.toml >> wrangler.toml && wrangler deploy --env=production && mv wrangler.toml.bak wrangler.toml
scripts.deploy:pro: [ -f "production.toml" ] && npm run deploy:pro:force || printf "\033[31mError:\033[0m production.toml not found."
